required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on April 10, 2017
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Frequency and Severity of Pleural Effusion Associated With the Use of Dasatinib in Patients With Chronic Myeloid Leukemia. A Descriptive, Mexican Multicenter Study
clinical_study.official_title: Frequency and Severity of Pleural Effusion Associated With the Use of Dasatinib in Patients With Chronic Myeloid Leukemia. A Descriptive, Mexican Multicenter Study

brief_summary.textblock: This is a retrospective, multicenter, descriptive analysis of patients with a diagnosis of chronic myeloid leukemia, treated with dasatinib for at least 45 days. The study will include 100 patients treated in different public centers in the Mexican Republic.

primary_outcome.measure: Detect the absence and presence of pleural effusion in Mexican patients measured from the medical records and databases of each of the participating medical centers
primary_outcome.time_frame: 1 year and 4 month of data collection

secondary_outcome.measure: Establish the factors associated with response of the patients who develop pleural effusion
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 1 year and 4 month of data collection
secondary_outcome.description: Factors: Hematological Response Standardization of counts in peripheral blood with leukocytes <10 × 10^9 and platelets <450 ×10^9 Absence of immature elements in the smear Basophils <5% Absence of palpable splenomegaly Complete Molecular Response (CMR) Undetectable BCR-ABL mRNA transcripts by real time quantitative and/or nested Partial Cytogenetic Response (PCR) in two consecutive blood samples of adequate quality (sensitivity >104) Major Molecular Response (MMR) Ratio of BCR-ABL to ABL (or other housekeeping genes) ≤0.1% on the international scale

secondary_outcome.measure: Main characteristics of the patients who develop pleural effusion
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 1 year and 4 month of data collection

arm_group.arm_group_label: Chronic myeloid leukemia patients treated with Dasatinib
arm_group.description: patients with a diagnosis of chronic myeloid leukemia treated with Dasatinib for at least 45 days

intervention.arm_group_label: Chronic myeloid leukemia patients treated with Dasatinib

study_pop.textblock: Public centers in the Mexican Republic

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Men and women ≥15 years of age
- Diagnosis of chronic myeloid leukemia in any phase that used dasatinib at any time between January 2008 and November 2014
- Have received dasatinib as part of their first-line or second-line treatment for at least 45 days
Exclusion Criteria:
- Patients who received dasatinib as part of any clinical trial
- Patients who do not have complete data on the data collection sheet
- Patients who do not have medical records available at the moment of the data verification
